title: Gibeath-haaraloth
html: GIBEATH-HAARALOTH(Gibʹe·ath-ha·arʹa·loth) [Hill of the Foreskins].The place where all the Israelite males born in the wilderness were circumcised after crossing the Jordan. Gibeath-haaraloth was near the city of Jericho and came to be called Gilgal.—Jos 5:3-10; see GILGAL No. 1.
